channel.title: Pathfinder Wiki/title>https://pathfinderwiki.comen Weapon in the Rifthttps://pathfinderwiki.com/wiki/Weapon_in_the_Rifthttps://pathfinderwiki.com/wiki/Weapon_in_the_RiftWeapon in the Rift, a Pathfinder Society scenario for tier 5-9 written by Nathan King, was released in January 2014.
